name: Curse of the Morning Moon
text: If you control a face-up "Gaia, the Mid-Knight Sun" or "Curse of the Midnight Sun": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only Special Summon 1 "Curse of the Monring Moon" per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon1 "Gaia" or "Curse of" monster from your hand or GY. You can only activate this effect of "Curse of the Midnight Sun" once per turn.
